title: A Blind teacher in a public school (TEFC)
creator_credit: Henry Felt, David Ticchi and Graduate School of Education, Harvard University
brief_description: Shows how one blind man, David Ticchi, carries out his daily responsibilities as a full-time teacher of English. He is seen performing normal tasks required of a classroom teacher, and when interviewed, he explains his teaching methods. Explores the peculiar advantages a blind teacher may bring to a sighted classroom. Includes interviews with David Ticchi’s students and colleagues.
